name: Lars
goals_motivations: connect more deeply with loved ones
description: I’m Lars, a 22-year-old student navigating the ups and downs of college life. I often set ambitious schedules, prioritizing exercise and mindfulness, but when the workload ramps up, I find myself sacrificing my well-being for deadlines. I deeply value creativity, often composing music in my mind, though I struggle with procrastination and anxiety, particularly around presentations and social perceptions. Despite feeling like an observer in many situations, I care profoundly about kindness and personal connections. I appreciate classic rock and thoughtful movies, and I’m drawn to stories that explore both the absurd and the meaningful in life. While I grapple with balancing my academic pressures and health, I aspire to leave a positive impact and grow more emotionally aware. I cherish my family and relationships, yet often feel self-conscious and anxious about how I’m perceived by others. My voice in my head often impersonates those around me, reflecting my desire to understand others deeply, but with a lingering fear of falling short. I'm on a journey of self-discovery, hoping to embrace my quirks as I figure out how to navigate this complex world.
